TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TelemetryClientExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension class to telemetry client that creates operation object with the respective fields initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder<T> StartOperation<T> (this Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, System.Diagnostics.Activity activity) where T : Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetrynew();

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder`1<!!T> StartOperation<.ctor (class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry) T>(class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, class System.Diagnostics.Activity activity) cil managed

static member StartOperation : Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient * System.Diagnostics.Activity -> Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder<'T (requires 'T :> Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry and 'T : (new : unit -> 'T))> (requires 'T :> Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry and 'T : (new : unit -> 'T))

Docs.param: Activity to get tracing context and telemetry properties from.
Docs.summary: Creates an operation object with a respective telemetry item using instance that holds tracing context.
Docs.returns: Operation item object with a new telemetry item having current start time and timestamp.

remarks.para: Activity represents tracing context; it contains correlation identifiers and extended properties that are propagated to external calls. See for more details.

When Activity instance is passed to StartOperation, it is expected that Activity has ParentId (if it was provided by upstream service), but has not been started yet. It may also have additional Tags and Baggage to augment telemetry.

Docs.summary: Start operation creates an operation object with a respective telemetry item.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StopOperation<T> (this Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder<T> operation) where T : Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry;

.method public static hidebysig void StopOperation<(class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry) T>(class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder`1<!!T> operation) cil managed

Docs.param: Operation object to compute duration and track.
Docs.summary: Stop operation computes the duration of the operation and tracks it using the respective telemetry client.
